data.query: SELECT CLI_PF_RECIBIDA.* FROM CLI_PF_RECIBIDA WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 AND (LOTE IN (SELECT LOTE FROM CLI_LOTES_A_MASIVA WHERE ACTIVACIONTARJETAS IN (1,3) AND (nrotarjetabanred IN (SELECT id_tarjeta FROM TJD_TARJETAS WHERE ESTADO IN ('Z') and NOACTIVAR=0 AND tz_lock=0) OR nrotarjetaaccdir IN (SELECT id_tarjeta FROM TJD_TARJETAS WHERE ESTADO IN ('Z') and NOACTIVAR=0 AND tz_lock=0)) OR LOTE IN (SELECT LOTE FROM CLI_LOTES_A_MASIVA WHERE ACTIVACIONTARJETAS IN (2)) AND (nrotarjetabanred IN (SELECT id_tarjeta FROM TJD_TARJETAS WHERE ESTADO IN ('T') and NOACTIVAR=0 AND tz_lock=0) OR nrotarjetaaccdir IN (SELECT id_tarjeta FROM TJD_TARJETAS WHERE ESTADO IN ('T') and NOACTIVAR=0 AND tz_lock=0))))
